hanzi-su-wiki:
丹

Значения

Красный, чистосердечный

Мнемоника

Тигель на ножках для приготовления растительных красок. Точка в центре — краска.

X		cinnabar, red
  • bright-red mineral 丶 kept in a small bag 冂 tied with a string 一; taken as elixir of life to keep the blood bright-red
 筋; 赤 朱 紅

purpleculture_info: Ideographic: A red pellet 丶 from a mine 井
purpleculture_examples:
契丹 [ qì dān ]: Qidan or Khitan, ethnic group in ancient China, a branch of the Eastern Hu people inhabiting the valley of the Xar Murun River in the upper reaches of the Liao River 辽河
丹顶鹤 [ dān dǐng hè ]: (bird species of China) red-crowned crane (Grus japonensis)
不丹 [ bù dān ]: Bhutan
丹青 [ dān qīng ]: painting
灵丹妙药 [ líng dān miào yào ]: effective cure, miracle medicine (idiom); fig. wonder-cure for all problems; panacea; elixir

heisig_chinese_memo: How about a rusty cinnabar red colored dilapidated boat, found abandoned somewhere. The smoke-stack and the keel have fallen off...
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: ржавчины цвета, красный, красный свинец, таблетки
koohiiStory1: How about a rusty cinnabar colored dilapidated boat, found abandoned somewhere. The smoke-stack and the keel have fallen off...
koohiiStory2: Rusty old boat with the bottom and top missing.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: This is a boat, but it's missing some pieces. That's because it's really rusty, so parts are falling off of it and it looks rust colored. It's getting more and more rusty as time goes on.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture this broken, rust colored boat. It's a reddish-brown color and it's definitely missing some important pieces.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: The rust colored boat has inspired you, so you sit down next to it in the sun and tan (たん). You want to be the exact same rust color as the boat, and in a few hours you're sure you'll match.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Watch your skin slowly change as you tan to match the rust colored boat. Feel your skin in the sun. This may not be good for your health, but it's great for fashion!
Ru_Meaning: rust-colored, red, red lead, pills, sincerity
Ru_Notes:
Используется в основном в названиях видов, мест, народностей, в транскрипции.
Сравни: алый цвет красный цвет киноварь (朱)
Не путать: 舟 (ふね、シュウ лодка).
Ru_Words:
丹に
  • красная земля
    • 丹色にいろ
  • красный
    • 黄丹おうに、おうだん
  • оранжевый
    • 丹朱たんしゅ
  • киноварь, ярко-красный цвет
    • 丹心たんしん
  • искренность, верность
Ru_Radicals: 一 (один), 丶 (капля), ノ, 亅 (зазубрина)

Kanshudo_mnemonic: there's one (一) wide (冂) dot (丶) of rust
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: How about a rusty cinnabar red colored dilapidated boat, found abandoned somewhere. The smoke-stack and the keel have fallen off...
humanum_full_description_en:
Jiajin inscription starts from " fan " from one point, " fan " is like a disc, but the meaning of " dan " should have nothing to do with the disc. Oracle or from the " well ", the original meaning of the configuration is unknown. In other words, it resembles cinnabar, like cinnabar in a mine, which means a dansha mining well. Press the character "丹" as the component, which is the same as the " well " shape, see "青" and "静".

Oracle is used as place name and country name. Such as "Ji Mao Bu Wang Cai (in) Dan".

In addition to being used as a person's name, the bronze inscription also means dansha and cinnabar. Geng wins: "Yibei Shipeng and Danyi 𣐼" Guo Moruo said: "Dan, Dansha. The word 𣐼 from the sound of wood 厈, doubt is the different text of management. The unit of dansha is 𣐼 speech, and it is still bei with friends. Cars speak with vehicles, horses speak with horses."

The text of the Warring States Period means red color, "Shangbo Chu Zhushu Seven. "The King of Wu Jianhuan": "The Taigong hopes to serve the alchemy (book) to the court", the "Alchemy" is a book written in red pen and ink.

"Said Wen": "The red stone of Ba Yue. It is like a pill well, and it is like a pill. Every pill belongs to the pill. 𤮺, the ancient literary pill. 㣋, also the ancient literary pill." Duan Yucai's note: "The pill stone The essence of medicine, so the essence of medicine is called pill."
humanum_short_description_en: Jia Jin inscription starts from " fan " from one point, " fan " is like a disc, but the meaning of " dan " should have nothing to do with the disc. Oracle or from the " well ", the original meaning of the configuration is unknown. In other words, it resembles cinnabar, like cinnabar in a mine, which means a dansha mining well.
humanum_full_description:
甲金文從「凡」從一點，「凡」象盤形，但於「丹」字中所指應與盤無關。甲骨文或從「井」，構形本義不明。或說一點象丹砂之形，象礦井中有丹砂，表示採丹井。按「丹」字作為部件，與「井」形通用，參見「青」、「靜」字。

　　甲骨文用為地名、方國名。如「己卯卜王才(在)丹」。

　　金文除用作人名外，又表示丹砂、朱砂。庚贏卣：「易貝十朋又丹一𣐼」，郭沫若曰：「丹，丹砂。𣐼字從木厈聲，疑即管之異文。丹砂之單位以𣐼言，猶貝以朋言，車以輛言，馬以匹言。」

　　戰國文字表示赤色的意思，《上博楚竹書七．武王踐阼》：「太公望奉丹箸(書)以朝」，「丹書」即用紅色筆墨所寫的書。

　　《說文》：「巴越之赤石也。象采丹井，一象丹形。凡丹之屬皆从丹。𤮺，古文丹。㣋，亦古文丹。」段玉裁注：「丹者石之精，故凡藥物之精者曰丹。」
humanum_short_description: 甲金文從「凡」從一點，「凡」象盤形，但於「丹」字中所指應與盤無關。甲骨文或從「井」，構形本義不明。或說一點象丹砂之形，象礦井中有丹砂，表示採丹井。

丹字的基本解释

丹
dān
红色：丹砂（朱砂）。丹桂（观赏植物，花为橘红色）。丹心碧血（赤诚的忠心，珍贵的热血）。丹青。
依成方制成的颗粒状或粉末状的中药：丸散膏丹。
姓。

丹字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dān］
［《廣韻》都寒切，平寒，端。］
(1)丹砂；朱砂。
(2)指不同色泽的美石。
(3)红色。
(4)涂染成红色。
(5)道家炼制的所谓长生不老药。
(6)精炼的成药。
(7)指南方。古代五行说以五色配五方，南方属火，火色丹，故称。
(8)喻赤忱。
(9)形容色彩绚丽。见“丹霄”。
(10)通“單”。放在整数与零数之间。
(11)姓。晋代有丹木。见《风俗通》。

丹字的英文翻译

◎ 丹
red

丹字的康熙字典解释

【子集上】【丶字部】　丹； 康熙笔画：4； 页码：页80第16
〔古文〕?㣋?【唐韻】都寒切【集韻】【韻會】多寒切【正韻】都艱切，?音單。赤色丹砂也。【書·禹貢】礪砥砮丹。【山海經】丹以赤爲主，黑白皆丹之類。【陶弘景曰】卽朱砂也。　又道家以烹鼎金石爲外丹，吐故納新爲內丹。【黃庭經】九轉八瓊丹。【註】八者：朱砂，雄黃，空靑，硫黃，雲母，戎鹽，硝石，雌黃也。　又【博物志】和氣相感，則陵出黑丹。仁主壽昌，民延壽命，天下太平。　又以朱色塗物曰丹。【揚雄·解嘲】朱丹其轂。　又容美曰渥丹。【詩·秦風】顏如渥丹。　又赤心無僞曰丹。【謝朓詩】旣秉丹石心，寧流素絲涕。　又姓。漢丹玉，宋丹山，明丹衷。　又丹陽，郡名。漢武帝攺鄣郡爲丹陽郡。晉武帝分立宣城，毗陵二郡。又州名。本赤翟地，元魏置汾州，後改丹州。又【崔豹古今註】丹徼，南方徼，色赤，故稱丹徼，爲南方之極也。　又丹丹，國名。見【南史】。　又【山海經】鳳凰產于丹穴。又竊丹，鳥名。爲九鳳之一。　又牡丹，花名。【本草】一名鼠姑。又木丹，梔子花別名。紫丹，茈草別名。　又叶都懸切，音顚。【

丹字的源字形

丹字的起名意思

：丹砂，朱砂；红色，形容色彩绚丽；也指不同色泽的美石；赤诚等之义。

Dan
Basic explanation of words
Dan
dān
Red: Dansha (cinnabar). Dangui (ornamental plant with orange-red flowers). Red heart and blood (sincere loyalty, precious blood). Danqing.
Granular or powdered Chinese medicine made according to the prescription: Pill San Gao Dan.
name.
Dan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dān］
["Guangyun" are all cold cut, flat cold, end. ]
(1) Dansha; Cinnabar.
(2) Refers to beautiful stones of different colors.
(3) Red.
(4) Painted and dyed red.
(5) The so-called elixir refined by Taoism.
(6) Refined patent medicine.
(7) Guide party. In ancient times, the five elements said that five colors were used to match the five directions. The southern part belonged to fire and fire color pill, so it was called.
(8) Yu Chichen.
(9) Describe brilliant colors. See "Dan Xiao".
(10) Through "single". Put between integer and zero.
(11) Last name. There was Danmu in the Jin Dynasty. See "Fengsutong".
Dan
English translation of words
◎ Dan
red
Dan
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset Part 1] [Dian Word Department] 　dan; Kangxi strokes: 4; page number: page 80 to 16
[Ancient text]? 㣋? [Tang Yun] All Han Qi [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Many Han Qi [Zheng Yun] are all difficult, the sound list. Red dansha also. 【Book·Yugong】Strengthen the pill. [Shanhaijing] The alchemy is dominated by red, and both black and white are alchemy and the like. [Tao Hongjing said] Also cinnabar.　In addition, Taoists use cooking dingjinshi as the outer pill, and vomiting the old and accepting the new as the inner pill. 【Huang Tingjing】Nine turns and eight Qiongdan. 【Note】Eight: Cinnabar, Realgar, Hollow, Sulfur, Mica, Rong Salt, Saltpeter, Orpiment.　[Natural History] and a sense of gas, then a black pill emerges from the mausoleum. Benevolence governs longevity, people prolong their lives, and the world is peaceful.　I said Dan again with vermilion paint. [Yang Xiong·Interpretation] Zhu Danqihu.　Rongmei said Wodan again. [Poetry·Qin Feng] Yan Ruwodan.　I said Dan with my heart and no falsehood. 【Xie Tiao's poems】Ning Bing Dan, stone heart, Ningliusu silk tears.　Another last name. Han Danyu, Song Danshan, Ming Danzhong.　Danyang again, the county name. Emperor Wu of the Han dynasty was Danyang County. Emperor Wu of Jin separated Xuancheng and Piling two counties. Also the name of the state. This Chidi land was established in Fenzhou during the Yuan and Wei Dynasties, and later changed to Danzhou. Also [Cui Bao ancient and modern notes] Danyu, southern 徼, color red, so it is called Dan 徼, it is also the extreme of the south.　You Dandan, the name of the country. See [Southern History].　[Shan Hai Jing] Phoenix is produced in Danxue. Also stole Dan, the name of the bird. One of the nine phoenixes.　 Peony again, flower name. [Materia Medica] A rat aunt. Also Mudan, another name of Gardenia. Purple Dan, the alias of Chrysanthemum vulgare.　The leaves are hanging and cutting, the sound. 【
Dan
Source glyph
Dan
Name meaning
：Cinnabar, cinnabar; red, which describes brilliant colors; also refers to beautiful stones of different colors; the meaning of sincerity and so on.

dãn

丹
“丹”的本义是“珠砂”。《尚
书》:“砺成势(音ni,石制的箭
链)丹”。这种矿物是从矿井中采
得的,所以甲骨文和金文的字形
都是在并形中间加一圈点。引中
为“红色”(比“赤”色浅)和“精炼
的成药”。
每
Дэн
дан
месяц
ухо
Дэн
рот
Дэн
Первоначальное значение слова «дан» - «жуша».
«Шаншу»: «Ли Чэнши (звук ни, цепь каменных стрел) Дань».
Этот вид минерала добывается в шахте, поэтому надписи на костях оракула и надписи на бронзе находятся в центре соединения с кругом.
Цитаты: «красный» (светлее «красный») и «рафинированное лекарство».
каждый
dān
I сущ.
1) киноварь; сурик; красная краска; красный
颜如渥丹 его лицо словно покрашено киноварью
铅丹 свинцовый сурик
铁丹 железный сурик
丹色 красный цвет
2) пилюля; патентованное средство; панацея; даос. философский камень, пилюля бессмертия, эликсир бессмертия
丹灶 даос. печь для приготовления пилюли бессмертия
灵丹妙药 исцеляющие пилюли и прекрасное лекарство; чудодейственное средство, панацея
II гл.
красить в красный цвет
丹桓宫楹 покрасить в красный цвет парные мемориальные колонны и столбы во дворце
III прил./наречие
искренний, чистосердечный, честный, преданный
丹祈 от всего сердца желать; искреннее пожелание
丹情 искренние чувства
IV собств.
1) (сокр. вм. 丹麦) Дания; датский
丹国 Дания
2) Дань (фамилия)
Radicals: 舟  (boat)
Meaning Mnemonic
This is a boat, but it's missing some pieces. That's because it's really rusty, so parts are falling off of it and it looks rust colored. It's getting more and more rusty as time goes on.
Picture this broken, rust colored boat. It's a reddish-brown color and it's definitely missing some important pieces.
Reading Mnemonic
The rust colored boat has inspired you, so you sit down next to it in the sun and tan (たん). You want to be the exact same rust color as the boat, and in a few hours you're sure you'll match.
Watch your skin slowly change as you tan to match the rust colored boat. Feel your skin in the sun. This may not be good for your health, but it's great for fashion!

一 (один), 丶 (капля), ノ, 亅 (зазубрина)
Используется в основном в названиях видов, мест, народностей, в транскрипции.
Сравни: алый цвет красный цвет киноварь (朱)
Не путать: 舟 (ふね、シュウ лодка).
丹に

    • 丹色にいろ
  • красный
    • 黄丹おうに、おうだん
  • оранжевый
    • 丹朱たんしゅ
  • киноварь, ярко-красный цвет
    • 丹心たんしん
